summary.para: Updates the attributes of one or more nodes in the current topology.

param.name: cUpdates
param.para: The number of elements in the pUpdates array.

param.name: pUpdates
param.para: Pointer to an array of structures. Each element of the array updates one attribute on a node.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

remarks.para: Currently the only attribute that can be updated is the MF_TOPONODE_MEDIASTOP attribute. The method ignores any other attributes.

summary.para: Updates the attributes of one or more nodes in the Media Session's current topology.
The Media Session exposes this interface as a service. To get a pointer to the interface, call . The service identifier is MF_TOPONODE_ATTRIBUTE_EDITOR_SERVICE.

remarks.para: Currently the only attribute that can be updated is the MF_TOPONODE_MEDIASTOP attribute.
